circumstances: Sarah Carroll was last seen near her home at 1 Garrison Place, Falkirk. Her disappearance was reported by her mother after failing to show up for a planned lunch at the community center. Earlier that day, Sarah had spoken with her colleague about arranging a book club meet in Dunhalin, Rumford. Concerns arose due to her disability, raising worries about her ability to navigate alone. Abigail Carroll, a relative, reached out to the authorities when Sarah didn't respond to calls. After a thorough search, Sarah was located safely in Stirling, much to the relief of her family and friends. Police determined she had wandered off unintentionally, but was unharmed.
